snippet.title: Dany Shoham: THE NEW MAP OF CHEMICAL AND BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS IN THE MIDDLE EAST
snippet.description: * Dany Shoham: THE NEW MAP OF CHEMICAL AND BIOLOGICAL WEAPONS IN THE MIDDLE EAST (clueweb12-0401wb-57-28208) http://www.acpr.org.il/ENGLISH%2DNATIV/04-issue/shoham-4.htm ...the same space. This review presents and analyzes the new Arab-Iranian system concerned with chemical and biological weapons. Still, it follows the procurement processes that led to the persisting related programs in Syria, Iran and Egypt, while laying emphasis, in parallel, on the recent shifts that took place in Iraq and Libya. The sphere of chemical and biological terrorism is visited as well, certainly, so as to gain a degree of... [cached version]
